text: Phirâ€Œaunanu helidanu; saradarare, nimage nanna horatu berobba devariruvudu nanagantu tiliyadu. Sadya, o haman, ninu nanagagi ave mannannu benkiyalli urisu mattu nanagagi ondu ettarada gopuravannu nirmisu. A mulaka nanu musana devara kadegom'me inuki noduttene. Nanantu avanannu (musarannu) sullugaranende bhavisuttene
